plot: Family film with the cartoon characters of Monica's Gang (Turma da Mônica). Chuck Billy (Chico Bento) starts a radio station with some innovative programs, and the competition gets angry.
title: A Rádio do Chico Bento
plot_es: Family film with the cartoon characters of Monica's Gang (Turma da Mônica). Chuck Billy (Chico Bento) starts a radio station with some innovative programs, and the competition gets angry.
plot_en: Family film with the cartoon characters of Monica's Gang (Turma da Mônica). Chuck Billy (Chico Bento) starts a radio station with some innovative programs, and the competition gets angry.
